Uses of Interface
xxl.core.util.timers.Timer

Packages that use Timer
xxl.core.util.timers This package contains different implementations of the Timer interface as well as some useful static methods for dealing with timers. 
 

Uses of Timer in xxl.core.util.timers
 

Classes in xxl.core.util.timers that implement Timer
 class JavaTimer
          Implements the Timer interface based on java.lang.System.currentTimeMillis.
 class JNITimer
          This is a timer which uses a native library to implement the Timer interface.
 

Fields in xxl.core.util.timers with type parameters of type Timer
static Function<java.lang.Object,Timer> TimerUtils.FACTORY_METHOD
          Factory method returning the best availlable (known) timer.
 

Methods in xxl.core.util.timers with parameters of type Timer
static double TimerUtils.getTimeInSeconds(Timer timer, long zeroTime, long time)
          Calculates the time in seconds for a given time and timer.
static long TimerUtils.getTimerResolution(Timer t)
          Calculates the timer resolution by calling getDuration until the value is different from zero.
static long TimerUtils.getZeroTime(Timer t)
          Calculates the time that is needed to do the timer calls without performing operations.
static void TimerUtils.timerTest(Timer t)
          Performs a timer test and outputs the data on stdout.
static void TimerUtils.warmup(Timer t)
          Warms up the timer by calling start and getDuration 10000 times.
